title: Implement Superstructure
body: Set up the superstructure architecture for the robot.

title: Create multiple drivetrain constant classes
body: Create separate constant classes for: old comp; woodbot; practice; and comp robots.

title: Ask CAD for speculative motor types on robot
body: Needed for configs and subsystem setup.

title: Implement Flywheel subsystem
body: Configuration: 2 motors

title: Implement Hood subsystem
body: Controls angle of shot. Configuration: 1 motor

title: Implement Intake subsystem
body: Configuration: 1 motor to spin roller; 1 motor to deploy/retract pivot

title: Implement Indexer subsystem
body: Configuration: 1 motor

title: Implement Snap to Hub
body: Automation feature to automatically align robot to the hub.

title: Set up robot configs for Pathplanner
body: Correctly configure robot parameters for Pathplanner.

title: Determine trench vs bump route for Bulletproof auto
body: Decide whether Bulletproof auto should go under trench or over bump. Determine which route is faster.

title: Set up unit testing
body: Implement unit testing to check if code outputs desired results.

title: Set up woodbot drivetrain
body: Woodbot needs to be able to drive.

title: Implement WPILib logging
body: Priority: High. Try WPILib's built-in logging first.

title: Evaluate AdvantageKit as logging alternative
body: If WPILib logging doesn't meet our needs; evaluate AdvantageKit as an alternative.

title: Implement QuestNav
body: Lower priority - to be done later.

title: Determine practice field status
body: Is the practice field under construction?

title: Procure ThinkPad chargers
body: Need to buy more ThinkPad chargers.

title: Determine charger storage location
body: Where are the laptop chargers going to be stored?

title: Set up GitHub tickets for work tracking
body: Point-people: Emma & James

title: Determine 2025 bot availability timeline
body: How long do we have access to the 2025 bots?

title: Ask CAD about limelight spot in design
body: Priority: High. Ask CAD if they are designing with a limelight mounting spot in mind. Owner: Mr. James

title: Implement FMS API for scoring code
Test motors using REV Hardware Client
Implement localization with limelight and odometry
Set up epics for GitHub issues
Ask CAD about gear ratios in drive base
Implement shooter commands
body: Priority: High. Create test commands for the shooter subsystem.

title: Implement intake commands
body: Priority: High. Create commands for the intake subsystem.

title: Remove steer override from autos
body: Priority: High. Ensure autos are bulletproof by removing steer override from pathplanner.

title: Plan and diagram basic superstructure state machine
body: Priority: High. Minimum viable superstructure would include intaking and shooting as states. Create state diagram before implementation.

title: Implement localization pose from hub
body: Priority: High. Successfully get a pose from the hub if present.

title: Implement subsystem disable on robot disable
body: Priority: High. Stop all subsystems when robot is disabled.

title: Create test commands for aligning to target
body: Test commands for vision-based alignment to targets.

title: Determine starting positions for autos
body: Figure out optimal starting points for autonomous routines.

title: Prepare autos for Friday/Saturday testing
body: Need autonomous routines set up before Friday. Check with manufacturing if this timeline is realistic.

title: Implement build and formatting tests
body: Set up CI checks for build verification and code formatting.

title: Transition to branch-based development
body: Switch team workflow from direct commits to branch-based development with pull requests.

title: Research shoot on the move implementation
body: James needs to do deeper research into implementing shooting while the robot is moving.

title: Implement defense mode
body: Create a defense mode for robot operation.

title: Implement held fuel detection
body: Implement GAS TANK sensor integration for detecting held fuel in the robot.

title: Present localization implementation writeup
body: Create and present documentation on the localization implementation.

title: Test localization code
body: Verify localization code works as expected with real hardware.

title: Set up AprilTags on field
body: Install AprilTag markers on the practice field for vision testing.

title: Port CommandLogger utility from RainMaker25
body: Port the CommandLogger utility class from RainMaker25 to RainMaker26 for logging command start and end events.

title: Port RobotUtils utility from RainMaker25
body: Port the RobotUtils utility class from RainMaker25 to RainMaker26 for USB writability checks.

title: Add JavaDoc comments to Intake subsystem
body: Add proper JavaDoc comments to all public methods in the Intake.java class.

title: Mount and configure Limelight on WoodBot
body: Get limelight physically mounted on WoodBot and properly configured for field use.

title: Tune Pathplanner PID constants
body: Tune the holonomic PID values for Pathplanner path following.

title: Tune drive motor PID (timebox 1 hour)
body: Tune drive motor PID constants. Time-boxed to 1 hour maximum.

title: Run SysID routines on drivetrain
body: Execute SysID characterization runs on the drivetrain.

title: Measure and configure wheel radius
body: Accurately measure wheel radius and update configuration.

title: Run and validate autonomous routines
body: Execute autonomous routines on the field and validate behavior.

title: Implement controller button bindings
body: Set up controller button bindings for driver and operator controls.

title: Test localization accuracy on field
body: Validate localization code accuracy with real hardware on the field.

title: Implement full robot simulation
body: Get full robot simulation working with all subsystems.

title: Design WoodBot superstructure architecture
body: Plan and document the superstructure design for WoodBot testing.

title: Prepare IOs for practice bot
body: Set up IO layer configurations for the practice bot.

title: Implement basic auto commands for intake
body: Create registered auto command for intake operation.

title: Implement basic auto commands for shooting
body: Create registered auto command for shooting operation.

title: Implement follow path auto command
body: Create registered auto command for path following in autos.

title: Implement automated shooting command routine
body: Create full automated shooting sequence command.

title: Implement passing command
body: Create command for passing game pieces to alliance partners.

title: Implement shoot modes for different game situations
body: Create logic for when to shoot vs hold based on game state.

title: Implement target selection states
body: Create states for selecting targets based on robot position; match time; and auto winner.

title: Implement turret auto-tracking of hub
body: Implement automatic hub tracking with the turret subsystem.

title: Implement automated check for subsystem sim compatibility
body: Create tooling to verify all subsystems can run in simulation.

title: Evaluate spindexer prototype for single ball stream
body: Test spindexer design for managing single stream of balls.

title: Update SparkMax and SparkFlex firmware
body: Update REV motor controller firmware to latest versions.

title: Fix Talon current logging
body: Fix current logging implementation for TalonFX motor controllers.

title: Add setpoint logging to inputs
body: Add double setpoint value to logged inputs.

title: Add atSetpoint boolean to inputs
body: Add boolean isAtSetpoint flag to logged inputs.

title: Merge vision simulation branch
body: Merge the vision sim branch into main; check for PhotonSim Java LSP issues.

title: Check in with Emma on planning board issues
body: Coordinate with Emma on which issues she's adding to the planning board.
